pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: ワインの飲みすぎでふらふらになった。
lessons.english: He was groggy from too much wine.

lessons.japanese: 夫の死後私はゾンビのようにふらふら歩き回っていた。
lessons.english: After my husband's death I walked around like a zombie.

lessons.japanese: 道路をふらふら横断する人は非常な危険に身をさらす。
lessons.english: A jaywalker exposes himself to great danger.

lessons.japanese: 今日はちょっとふらふらする。
lessons.english: I feel a little weak today.
